CustomField.description: Calculate the next anniversary either wedding or birthday. This field is used in ICON ios to get the CA birthday clients.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Birthdate) , TECH_UpcomingWeddingDate__c , IF( ISBLANK(Anniversary__c ), TECH_UpcomingBirthdayDate__c, IF( TECH_UpcomingWeddingDate__c > TECH_UpcomingBirthdayDate__c, TECH_UpcomingBirthdayDate__c, TECH_UpcomingWeddingDate__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: TECH Upcoming Anniversary Date
